title: I've had an application for PBE requested for about 3 years now, is there a way I can reapply?
body:
^Title

It's been about 3 -4 years and I've really wanted to test in the PBE, however I've been stuck on the "Pending" area ever since I first applied. Is there any possible way I can reapply for a PBE Position?

replies.body:
We aren't able to manually review PBE applications, so I can't look into your application for you. You can't apply more than once, unfortunately. Although the criteria with which we select our PBE testers changes all the time, one thing that remains consistent is we look for *really active* players that are a positive influence on their fellow summoners. Check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more info on how the system works.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
